Four Theo [I]717-baby have a love - hate relationship with uncompleted puzzles . Unanswered questions . Unsolved problems . [I]717-baby find them compelling , yet utterly tormenting . [People]1718-people say [I]717-baby ’m [a brilliant chemist]487-a brilliant chemist , but honestly , [I]717-baby just ca n’t stand when problems that clearly have solutions go unsolved . [I]717-baby happen to be working on the most important problem of [my]717-baby career : how to create a dehydrated hemostatic agent with vascular repair properties or , in [layperson]488-layperson ’s terms , a dehydrated version of [my]717-baby original Vossameer gel , which helps stave off blood loss . [I]717-baby know it ’s technically possible . It has to be . This new formula could save a lot of lives . It would be light and portable , perfect for small first - aid kits . It could be issued to [soldiers]489-soldiers . Shared with aid workers . Kept in [remote villages]490-remote villages where medical transport can take days . It would be [my]717-baby most important breakthrough ever . And then [I]717-baby realize [I]717-baby ’m thinking about flowers instead of formulas , and [I]717-baby go back to the board . [I]717-baby ’d hoped to have dehydrated [Vossameer]77-vossameer nailed in time for the Locke banquet . [I]717-baby really had hoped to use the occasion to announce it ; the foundation would get the publicity bump , and [our]1445-our partnership would be off to a positive start . [We]1445-our could work together to expedite the testing . It wo n’t happen now . The fact that [I]717-baby wo n’t have the thing solved by the banquet is bad , yet it feels like far less of a disaster than it might have a month ago . [My]717-baby race for the formula used to be the only thing on the landscape of [my]717-baby life . Now it exists alongside kitchen things and ironic cookies and [hotel]1446-hotel trysts and long afternoon walks when [I]717-baby should be working . It lives in [a world]1447-a world where conflicted emotions can be contained in one simple , fierce word over the phone . Where beauty is an asymmetrical freckle . Where baby goats play . Where [I]717-baby can wake up and [Lizzie]605-theo is the first thing [I]717-baby see . And [I]717-baby lie there loving everything about [her]605-theo so hard that it wakes [her]605-theo up . And really , those baby goat videos . The ridiculous way [they]1448-they hop while [they]1448-they ’re running . Or more like [they]1448-they pop into the air , mid - run , and it ’s so cute , [you]1449-you ca n’t look away .
